fr.groupe40.projet.model.board

Class Galaxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.groupe40.projet.model.board.Galaxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Galaxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    'Board' class. It contains the data of the game as ships, planets, ...
    Author:
    Jordane Masson, Sarah Portejoie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
